comments.author: Usee00759
comments.body: I used it and was very impressed on the outcome. People need to realize that Neuroni AI's code is standalone and independent of chatGPT, Bard or any other AI for that matter. It was coded from scratch and uses decentralized servers to keep your private data private and secure.WhatsApp release of their product coming up on Monday 10th April 2023
